description: This file defines the LearningProvider class, which manages learning-related data such as lessons and leaderboard entries for a Flutter app. It uses a mock service to load data asynchronously and notifies listeners of state changes.

classes.name: LearningProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages lessons, leaderboard data, and loading state for a Flutter application.

methods.name: LearningProvider
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the provider with a MockServices instance.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously loads lessons and leaderboard data from the mock service, updating the loading state accordingly.

methods.name: _setLoading
methods.description: Sets the loading flag and notifies listeners of the state change.
